EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_9AM Apache Geode (incubating) Clubhouse #2 - Secret Sauce for Networ
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Apache Geode (incubating) Clubhouse #2 - Secret Sauce for Network Partition-Tolerance
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Apache Geode (incubating) Clubhouse #2 - Secret Sauce for Network Partition-Tolerance Meet other developers and contributors of Apache Geode (incubating) at the next Apache Geode Clubhouse virtual meeting.
Our agenda:
- How Geode handles network partitions through its distributed membership feature - Demo of Geode operating in a network partition simulation - Code walk through of Apache Geode showing how this is implemented. - Open Q&A
Register for the meeting and we'll send you log-in instructions, a reminder, and a link to its recording.
Featured Presenter: Bruce Schuchardt is a senior engineer at Pivotal, is a contributor to the Apache Geode project, and has worked on GemFire since its inception in 2002. He is responsible for the replication, consistency and membership in GemFire and Apache Geode distributed systems. Bruce holds an MS in computer science from University of Massachusetts. North America Thursday, June 25, 2015 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Register <http://connect.pivotal.io/OSS_Webinar_9AMApacheGeodeincubatingClubhouse2-SecretSauceforNetworkPartition-ToleranceinApacheGeode_Register.html>
